product_name: Outdoor RX Camp Soap - 4 fl. oz. - Overstock
long_description: Biodegradable, concentrated and fragrance-free Outdoor RX Camp Soap is ideal for cleaning hands, body, hair, clothing and dishes when you're traveling and camping. Fragrance-free formula works in fresh or salt water and hot or cold temperatures. 4 fl. oz. Overstock.
short_description: Biodegradable, concentrated and fragrance-free Outdoor RX Camp Soap is ideal for cleaning hands, body, hair, clothing and dishes when you're traveling and camping.
